00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00040 #include "CmdInsertSeparatorKit.h"
00041 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00042 #include "SceneModel.h"
00043 #include "Trace.h"
00044 #include "tgf.h"
00045 #include "TSeparatorKit.h"
00046 
00047 CmdInsertSeparatorKit::CmdInsertSeparatorKit( TSeparatorKit* separatorKit,  const QModelIndex& parentIndex, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00048 : QUndoCommand("InsertSeparatorKit", parent), m_separatorKit ( separatorKit ), m_coinParent( 0 ), m_pModel( model )
00049 {
00050         Trace trace( "CmdInsertSeparatorKit::CmdInsertSeparatorKit", false );
00051         
00052         if( !m_separatorKit ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertSeparatorKit Null separatorKit." );
00053         m_separatorKit->ref();
00054         
00055         if( !parentIndex.isValid() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertSeparatorKit called with invalid ModelIndex." );
00056         InstanceNode* instanceParent = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00057         m_coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( instanceParent->GetNode() );
00058 }
00059 
00060 CmdInsertSeparatorKit::~CmdInsertSeparatorKit()
00061 {
00062         Trace trace( "CmdInsertSeparatorKit::~CmdInsertSeparatorKit" );
00063         m_separatorKit->unref();
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CmdInsertSeparatorKit::undo()
00067 {
00068         Trace trace( "CmdInsertSeparatorKit::undo" );
00069         m_pModel->RemoveCoinNode( m_row, *m_coinParent );
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CmdInsertSeparatorKit::redo()
00073 {
00074         Trace trace( "CmdInsertSeparatorKit::redo" );
00075 
00076         m_row = m_pModel->InsertCoinNode( *m_separatorKit, *m_coinParent );
00077         
00078 }
